p: If moral hazard concerns the fear that ‘the prospect of geoengineeering the Earth in response to climate change might exacerbate the very behaviors contributing to climate change’ ( Lin, 2013: 674), how can we best conceive of a ‘security hazard’? I propose the security hazard as the following: in an attempt to gain security against future risks, new technologies can create security problems that compromise the original aim of preventing risk.
